track.name: Tracking
track.desc: The program can follow another program or netrunner through the Net.

recon.name: Auto Re-Rez
recon.desc: The program can reconstruct itself even if destroyed by rolling a 5 or 6 on 1D6.

recog.name: Recognition
recog.desc: The program can distinguish between different netrunner signals and programs.

invis.name: Invisibility
invis.desc: The program is +2 Strength to evade detection.

mem.name: Memory
mem.desc: The program can remember specific events and people.

spd.name: Speed
spd.desc: The program adds +2 to deck speed when it runs.

end.name: Endurance
end.desc: The program is tireless and will never quit unless destroyed.

rep.name: Replication
rep.desc: The program can copy itself into an architecture if it has root access.

copy.name: Copy protection
copy.desc: If you try to copy the software you should make DV24 check against Programming skill
